page.title: 12RESURRANCE FARM
page.content: Mr & Mrs Wimberley are the tenants of Resurrance Farm which they rent off Prince Charles.Their attractive farm house was built over 300 years ago. The farm is 194 acres and is split into 3 separate parts. The land use is 114 grass, 70 acres barley and 10 acres wheat. Most of the grass is used to keep 150 ewes,24 lambs, 50 Friesian cows and 30 calves.The 150 ewes can normally be expected to produce over 200 lambs per year for meat.The Friesians are a milk herd and calves are bought in from other farmers for fattening. There is a lot of machinery on the farm, examples being 3 tractors 1 plough ,1 baler and 3 trailers. The whole farm is worked by 5 people, 3 who work on the farm and in the farm house. Resurrance farm is typical of our area.
